firms.name: New Zealand

firms.name: Uruguay
firms.description: A small South American country with a robust social welfare system, diversified economy, and a history of political stability and institutional strength.

firms.name: Netherlands
firms.description: A European country with a highly developed economy, notable for its trade, infrastructure, and liberal social policies.

firms.name: England

firms.name: South Korea
firms.description: An East Asian nation known for rapid industrialization, technological innovation, and strong institutions, with global cultural influence through K-pop and cinema.

firms.name: Ireland
firms.description: An island nation in Europe recognized for its high-tech economy, strong institutions, and significant contributions to finance, pharmaceuticals, and cultural industries.

firms.name: Malaysia
firms.description: A Southeast Asian country known for its diverse economy, rapid industrial development, strategic trade position, and multi-ethnic cultural landscape.
